item.title: Presentations
item.description:
See also researchmap.

Scheduled in future

  • Grain growth bihavior in electrodeposited nanocrystalline FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy
    Atsuya Watanabe, Takahisa Yamamoto, Koichiro Nambu, Yorinobu Takigawa
    IFHTSE2023, 2023-11-15.

2023

  • めっき法によるバルクナノ結晶FeCoNiミディアムエントロピー合金の創製
    渡邉充哉, 山本剛久, 瀧川順庸
    第30回機械材料・材料加工技術講演会(M&P2023) 2023-09-28.

  • Development of high-strength bulk nanocrystalline FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy via electrodeposition
    Atsuya Watanabe, Takahisa Yamamoto, Yorinobu Takigawa
    International Symposium of Graduate School of Engineering, Osaka Metropolitan University, Osaka, 2023-09-20.

  • 水中レーザーアブレーションによるコアシェル型FeCoNiミディアムエントロピー合金ナノ粒子の鎖状構造形成
    八ツ橋知幸, 渡邉充哉
    光化学討論会, Hiroshima, 2023-09-06.

2023

  • Fabrication of FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy by laser ablation in water using UV picosecond laser pulses
    Atsuya Watanabe, ◦Tomoyuki Yatsuhashi.
    HEA International Workshop, Kyoto, 2023-02-14, 15.

2022

  • Crystal orientation evolutions during grian growth in electrodeposited nanocrystalline FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy
    ◦Atsuya Watanabe,Yorinobu Takigawa.
    1st 結晶性材料の結晶配向評価および結晶方位解析技術研究会, Atami, 2022-10.
